alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 7:07PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central St. Johns, north central Putnam, northeastern Clay and southeastern Duval Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 707 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Green Cove Springs to 6 miles southwest of Picolata. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, Green Cove Springs, Mandarin, Fruit Cove, World Golf Village, Fleming Island, Nocatee, Durbin, Vilano Beach and Picolata. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Western Clay; Western Putnam
